mapper.select: select s.SIG_ID,s.SIG_Code,s.typeFlag,s.SIG_Name,s.SIG_Unit sigUnit,s.SIG_Type,s.SIG_FAC_ID,s.SIG_Address,s.SIG_AddressNum,s.SIG_DataType,s.flag,d.DSIG_Value,d.DSIG_DateTime dsigDateTime,d.schoolId schoolId from C_Signal s left join C_DSignal d on d.DSIG_SIG_Code = s.SIG_Code where d.schoolId = #{schoolId} and s.flag = #{flag} and d.DSIG_DateTime=(select MAX(DSIG_DateTime) from C_DSignal) order by d.DSIG_DateTime desc,s.SIG_Code

select s.SIG_ID SIG_ID,s.SIG_Code SIG_Code ,s.typeFlag typeFlag,s.SIG_Name SIG_Name,d.DSIG_Value DSIG_Value,d.DSIG_DateTime dsigDateTime,d.schoolId schoolId from C_Signal s left join C_DSignal d on d.DSIG_SIG_Code = s.SIG_Code where d.schoolId = #{schoolId} and s.typeFlag between 3 and 4 and RIGHT(d.DSIG_DateTime,5)='00:00' and ( datediff ( d.DSIG_DateTime , #{dsigDateTime} ) = 0 ) order by d.DSIG_DateTime desc,s.SIG_ID asc

select s.SIG_ID,s.SIG_Code,s.typeFlag,s.SIG_Name,s.SIG_Unit sigUnit,s.SIG_Type,s.SIG_FAC_ID,s.SIG_Address,s.SIG_AddressNum,s.SIG_DataType,s.flag,d.DSIG_Value,d.DSIG_DateTime dsigDateTime,d.schoolId schoolId from C_Signal s left join C_DSignal d on d.DSIG_SIG_Code = s.SIG_Code where d.schoolId = #{schoolId} and d.DSIG_DateTime=(select MAX(DSIG_DateTime) from C_DSignal) order by d.DSIG_DateTime desc,s.SIG_Code
